Perceptor:

"That depends of her"said the male while he started to untied h=
er wrists and ankles, her wrists, altought healed,  they slighty showed the=
 marks of all treatment that she had suffred as POW "Help me to lay her in =
the anti-gravity cart, we need to take her to medical bay, Hydras is waitti=
ng us there; if all is according with the plan, when she wake up she wont r=
emember anything and she will have an neutral aligement... And dont be nerv=
ous, she wont bite you.."

Perceptor did a last scan and dryly said "She's =
ready to move, let's go to Medical bay"


From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: Thur=
sday, March 11, 2010 5:56 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Recov=
ering Rodimus/BlackFortress


  
> "Be ready, I'll retire the stasis, let's=
 see how good this program worked"said the blind predacon"Get something to =
move her to Medical bay, after the stasis is removed we will have a while "=
 then he opened his comlink and  said to Hydras "Lord Hydras, she will wake=
 up soon "

Rodimus nodded as he assisted Perceptor as best he could. Rodim=
us had
never been deep into the technology side of things, content more to =
be
a warrior. He had listened to Perceptor's words, and knew that this
was =
the best way to help Nightlight, but he couldn't help feeling
nervous for h=
er at the same time.

She would be a Predacon. Rodimus drew a grim comfort =
from that thought
as he got an anti-gravity cart so she could rest on it mu=
ch like a bed
and yet still be moved easily as needed.

He stepped over to =
help move her if Perceptor needed it, "What form
will she take?" Rodimus as=
ked curiously.

(TAG)

Preston
(Rodimus)
